compliant.section: The Company will take all steps reasonably necessary to ensure that Your data is treated securely and in accordance with this Privacy Policy and no transfer of Your Personal Data will take place to an organization or a country unless there are adequate controls in place including the security of Your data and other personal information.
compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness, fairness and transparency, Integrity and confidentiality, Data security

compliant.section: If the Company is involved in a merger, acquisition or asset sale, Your Personal Data may be transferred.
compliant.legal provisions: Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject, Information to be provided where personal data have not been obtained from the data subject

non_compliant.section: no transfer of Your Personal Data will take place to an organization or a country unless there are adequate controls in place including the security of Your data and other personal information.
non_compliant.legal provisions: General principle for transfers, Transfers on the basis of an adequacy decision, Transfers subject to appropriate safeguards, Derogations for specific situations
non_compliant.amend: The policy should specify the adequate controls in place, such as Standard Contractual Clauses, Binding Corporate Rules, or approved Codes of Conduct. It should also mention the possibility of data transfers to countries deemed adequate by the European Commission and provide information about users' rights regarding such transfers.
